data.title: Yuvika Chaudhary - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Yuvika Chaudhary: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Indian actress recognized for her roles in numerous Bollywood productions including Om Shanti Om, Summer 2007, and Toh Baat Pakki! In 2015, she participated as a contestant on the reality show Bigg Boss 9. In 2019, she showcased her dancing skills on the dance reality show Nach Baliye 9 alongside her husband Prince Narula. She ultimately claimed victory as the winner of the competition.

Before Fame

In 2004, she actively took part in Zee Cine Stars Ki Khoj, a talent hunt show. Her participation in the program opened doors for her acting career and led to a significant opportunity to star as Aastha in the widely-acclaimed television series Astitva...Ek Prem Kahani.

Trivia

She made a memorable appearance in a Coca-Cola advertisement and earned the attention of director Farah Khan. Her popular yuvikachaudhary Instagram has amassed 3.6 million followers.

Family Life

She is from Baraut in Uttar Pradesh, Yuvika. She was in a decade-long relationship with actor Vipul Roy before meeting Prince Narula during their time together on Bigg Boss 9. Following their stint on the show, Prince Narula proposed to her on February 14th, 2018, and the couple got engaged. They tied the knot on October 12th, 2018 in Mumbai.

Associated With
